About me

My name is Oleh

I am a web developer with experience in building user interfaces and web applications. My skills include proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and experience with frameworks such as React and Jquery. My goal is to build effective and creative solutions for clients, ensuring high quality and professionalism in every project.

Web-development

I have been doing web development for 4 years. And all this time I develop in this direction, I have a lot of experience in this field.

Application development

I have a background in Application development, and I am also developing in this area.

UI/UX Design

I have experience in UI/UX Design. I can make beautiful and clear interfaces of sites

Skills

What can I do for you
HTML5
It's what creates the framework of your website or app, and version five will allow me to create a more SEO-optimised structure for your product
CSS3
This style language allows me to create absolutely any look and feel for your website or app. Everything is limited only by your imagination!
Java Script
This programming language allows you to animate anything: sliders, windows, tooltips, tabs, receiving data from the server, and more
Jquery
The Jquery library will speed up development. We will not integrate it into the project without necessity, but we have the skill to work with it
React
This library allows you to create web applications. We can create the most interactive product exactly for your purposes
Node.js
This platform allows you to create a backend for your product - the "brains" that will perform actions that the user doesn't see

Mongo.db

This is a non-relational database that will store your website or application data
